lead_paragraph: Northampton centre Luther Burrell has been offered the chance to reboot his England career, having been drafted into their Six Nations squad on Sunday to replace the concussed Ollie Devoto.

headline.print_headline: Luther Burrell Back in England Squad After Devoto Injury
headline.main: Luther Burrell Back in England Squad After Devoto Injury
